title: Hero: Menu button
code:
<gds-card 
  width="max-content"
  flex-direction="row"
  variant="secondary"
  border-color="primary"
  background-color="transparent"
  padding="0"
  border-width="0 0 4xs 0"
  gap="0"
  height="max-content"
  overflow="hidden"
  border-radius="0"
>
  <gds-menu-button compact selected>
    <gds-icon-bell slot="trail"></gds-icon-bell>
    Notification
  </gds-menu-button>
  <gds-popover>
    <gds-menu-button compact slot="trigger">
      <gds-icon-people slot="trail"></gds-icon-people>
      Profile
    </gds-menu-button>
    <gds-flex padding="m">Profile stuff</gds-flex>
  </gds-popover>
  <gds-menu-button
    href="https://github.com/seb-oss/green"
    compact
    target="_blank"
  >
    <gds-icon-square-arrow-top-right
      slot="trail"
    ></gds-icon-square-arrow-top-right>
    External
  </gds-menu-button>
</gds-card>
